description.en: The ten billions of properties has caused the reunion of two men, the love and hatred stories of the rich second generation.

God has run away? The world is in chaos? Michael goes to the human world to look for an old friend, and save the world together, but the reincarnated Lucifer can no longer remember him……  
  
And the reason turned out to be because Michael himself sealed his memories and powers away! To awaken him now……he must #%￥#……forget it, even if he has to cry and grovel, he will bury the pit that he dug himself!

title.en: Yumeochi ~Yume de Bokura wa Koi ni Ochiru~

altTitles.ja: ユメオチ～ユメで僕らは恋にオチる〜

altTitles.fr: Yumeochi : Rêver de tomber amoureux de toi

altTitles.pt-br: Yumeochi: Sonhando em me apaixonar por você

altTitles.en: Yumeochi: Dreaming of Falling For You

altTitles.id: Yumeochi: Bermimpi Tentang Jatuh CInta Kepada Mu

description.en: Even in university, Chono is stuck in the past regrets of his high school years. His dull days come to an abrupt end when he comes across a mysterious book... A book that allows him to return and re-do his high school life in his dreams. Follow Chono and the girls of his dreams as they reshape their wasted youths!
description.fr: Même à l'université, Chono est coincé dans les regrets de ses années de lycée. Ses journées ennuyeuses s'arrêtent brusquement lorsqu'il tombe sur un livre mystérieux... Un livre qui lui permet de revenir et de refaire sa vie de lycéen dans ses rêves. Suivez Chono et les filles de ses rêves alors qu'ils remodèlent leur jeunesse gâchée !
description.ja: やり残したことだらけの高校生活を送ったぼっち大学生の蝶野ツトム。空虚な日々を過ごす中で、偶然手にした不思議な本…。それはなんと、夢の中で超リアルな高校時代に戻れるものだった!!　関わることのなかった少女たちとの学園生活が始まる――。青春やり直し“夢”ラブコメ開幕!!
description.pt-br: Mesmo na universidade, Chono está preso aos arrependimentos do passado de seus anos de colegial. Seus dias monótonos terminam abruptamente quando ele se depara com um livro misterioso…. Um livro que lhe permite voltar e refazer sua vida de colegial em seus sonhos. Siga Chono e as meninas de seus sonhos enquanto reformulam seus jovens desperdiçados!

altTitles.ja: 父無双

altTitles.th: ท่านพ่อไร้เทียมทาน

description.en:
Noh Ga Jang has led the life of a warrior ever since he remembers, isolated from the world and illiterate to top it all, until he meets a beautiful woman who steals his heart. He marries her and they live a life of bliss, and she gets pregnant with his children. Against all odds, she unexpectedly dies during childbirth, leaving Noh alone with their newborn triplets. Desperate, saddened, but not broken, Noh swears to the heavens that he'll become an exemplary man to raise the invaluable treasures his wife left him.  
  
Watch the mighty warrior Noh become a Peerless Dad, and slowly realize in the way just how powerful he is for the sake of his children. 

---
- [Original Webtoon <kakao> Season 1](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=52226628)
- [Original Webtoon <kakao> Season 2](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=59925132)

C’est l’incroyable histoire d’un voyage mélant mariage, paternité et de combats par l’auteur de Red Storm.

description.ja:
孤児としてたらい回しにされていたところ、運良く師匠に拾われ武士としての道を見つけた。 特級解決師として名をはせた「天草家長」は運命の女性に出会い、その名の通り家長となる。 しかし、喜びもつかの間、一夜のうちに血のつながった三つ子を置いて妻に先立たれてしまう。 シングルファーザーとなってしまった「家長」の生活が今始まるーー！

---
- [Original Webtoon <kakao> Season 1](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=52226628)
- [Original Webtoon <kakao> Season 2](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=59925132)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/47154)
- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%97%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%9E%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%AD%E0%B9%84%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%89%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%99/132)
description.ko:
하늘의 뜻을 아니, 그 누가 아비父에 견주리오! 
고아로 떠돌다 운 좋게 스승을 만나 특급 해결사로 이름을 날리던 노가장.
사랑하는 여인을 만나 이름대로 가장家長이 된다는 기쁨도 잠시, 하루아침에 핏덩이 세쌍둥이를 홀로 키워야 하는 신세가 되었다. 아비는 그 어떤 경우라도 제 새끼의 입에 먹을 걸 넣어 줘야 하는 존재인 법! 노가장은 위험천만한 낭인 생활을 때려치우고 천룡회 갑급 무사가 되어  자식새끼들 잘 먹이고 입히고자 한다. 하지만 억지로 나간 출장 임무는 목숨이 위험하기만 하고 그 사이 사방에선 그의 아이들을 눈독 들이기 시작하는데…… 기다려라, 내 새끼들아! 여기 아비가 간다! 
아버지, 노가장의 좌충우돌 무협 액션&육아 일지!

* 원작소설 <지천명아비무쌍>

description.pt:
Noh Ga Jang teve a vida de um guerreiro desde que ele tem memória, isolado do mundo e analfabeto, até conhecer uma mulher bonita que rouba seu coração. Ele se casa com ela e vive uma vida de folia, e ela fica grávida dos seus filhos. Inesperadamente, ela morre durante o parto, deixando o Noh apenas com seus trigêmeos recém-nascidos. Desesperado, triste, mas não quebrado, Noh proclama aos céus que ele se tornará um homem exemplar para criar os tesouros inestimáveis que sua esposa o deixou.  
  
Vamos testemunhar o guerreiro implacável Noh se tornando um pai incomparável, percebendo o quão poderoso ele pode ser pelo bem dos seus filhos.

---
- [Original Webtoon <kakao> Season 1](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=52226628)
- [Original Webtoon <kakao> Season 2](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=59925132)

description.ru:
История бесподобного отца, которому известна воля небес. Автор Но Гён Чхан широко известен по манхве Красная Буря, но если вам нужна другая причина для чтения, то это удивительная история приключений мастера боевых искусств, включающая свадьбу, заботы отца и битвы. Она во многом похожа на Красную Бурю: крутой мастер, главный герой, беспокоящийся о своей семье, трагическая предыстория. Обязательно к прочтению для каждого, кому понравилась Красная Буря.

description.en:
Experience in love zero! Engineering student Geonwoo, fell in love with the handsome Hyung at the Adult shop! Shameful! Embarrassing! But I like him so much! Will Geonwoo’s love be ok like this…!?  
  
According to MangaUpdates, Season 2 has been permanently postponed.

altTitles.en: Neru: Way of the Martial Artist

altTitles.ja: NERU-武芸道行-

altTitles.es-la: Neru: El Camino de las Artes Marciales

description.en: Meet Neruma Isami, more commonly known as Neru. His martial artist grandfather left behind a book which serves as his only guide for his solitary training. Neru's about to finish middle school and is totally unsure about his future. But everything changes when meets the mysterious martial artist Akebi Haiba. She leads Neru to a high school where the toughest fighters have assembled. This martial arts high school action series now begins!
description.ja: 帰らぬ祖父の残した書物で一人鍛錬を続けるネルは、手練の技を繰り出す女子高生・朱琵に天門武芸十八般高校へと導かれる。現代に生きる武芸家達と出会い拓かれる、ネルの新たなる道!!　本格武芸学園譚、開幕！
description.ru:
Нэру, он же Нэрума Исами, - мальчик, который тренируется в одиночку по книге, оставленной его дедом, мастером боевых искусств.
Готовясь к выпуску из средней школы, он переживает о своем будущем, когда появляется загадочная девушка по имени Акэби, утверждающая, что она мастер боевых искусств.
Акэби приводит его в школу, где собираются современные мастера боевых искусств...
description.es-la: Neruma Isami, más conocido como Neru, sigue las enseñanzas de su abuelo, un artista marcial, quien le dejó un libro que le sirve como única guía para su entrenamiento en solitario. Neru está a punto de terminar la escuela secundaria y no está seguro de su futuro. Pero todo cambia cuando conoce a una misteriosa artista marcial llamada Akebi Haiba. Ella lleva a Neru a una escuela preparatoria donde se han reunido los luchadores más duros.

altTitles.ja: 風夏

description.en: Yuu Haruna just moved into town and is addicted to twitter. When he goes out to buy dinner he bumps into a mysterious girl, Fuuka Akitsuki, who breaks his phone thinking he was trying to take a picture of her panties. How will his new life change now?
description.pt-br: O protagonista Yuu Haruna se muda para uma cidade e conhece uma garota estranha chamada Fuuka (cujo nome tem caracteres kanji para "vento" e "verão"). Esta menina, que é como um vento de verão possui um poder misterioso para atrair as pessoas.

title.en: Necromancer Academy and the Genius Summoner

description.en: Necromancers have built a name for themselves as fearsome practitioners of magic capable of dropping entire empires to their knees. Simon Follentia is a necromancer with incredible latent talent! After being scouted for the necromancer's academy, this genius is ready to be nurtured and taken to the next level. But could Simon's insane talents attract some unforeseen consequences?

altTitles.vi: Tình Yêu Nhặt Trong Bãi Rác

altTitles.ja: はきだめに恋

description.en:
Under the cold weather, Hiro comes across a man who collapses in a garbage dump near his house. He nurses the man, Yamaga, who is weak and refuses to be helped and decides to let him stay with him. The distance between them is strange and frightening, and Hiro is always at a loss for what to do, but as they live together, he begins to see an unexpected side to the man...?

(Source: Tokyomangasha, translated)
description.vi: Câu chuyện về chàng trai Shibasaki làm part-time ở cửa hàng tiện lợi “may mắn” nhặt được Kenji – anh chồng tương lai trong bãi rác =))) aka “chồng nhặt” ver Yaoi. Đùa thôi, thực chất đây là câu chuyện tình yêu của hai con người tuyệt vọng, hoang mang về cuộc sống cứu rỗi và sưởi ấm lẫn nhau.

title.en: My Clueless First Friend - Side Stories

altTitles.ja: 事情を知らない転校生がグイグイくる。- Side Stories

altTitles.ja-ro: Jijyou wo Shiranai Tenkousei ga Guigui Kuru - Side Stories

altTitles.en: The Clueless Transfer Student Is Assertive. - Side Stories

description.en: Side stories for My Clueless First Friend (Jijyou wo Shiranai Tenkousei ga Guigui Kuru) posted on the author's Twitter and Pixiv.

altTitles.ja: 高校生家族

description.en: Spring is in the air, and Kotaro is about to begin his first year of high school. He's full of hope and anticipation of a wonderful life at his new school, only to have his dreams crushed by…his family?! Isobe Isobee Monogatari ~ Ukiyo wa Tsuraiyo creator Ryo Nakama's latest series combines family and school life gags, making it feel familiar but also fresh and new. This new genre of comedy will be sure to make the grade!
description.es-la: La primavera está en el aire y Kotaro está a punto de comenzar su primer año en la preparatoria. Está lleno de esperanza y anticipación de una maravillosa vida en su nueva escuela, solo para que sus sueños sean aplastados por ... ¡¿Su familia ?!
description.pt-br: Kotaro está feliz e esperançoso para o seu primeiro dia de aula no ensino médio. Porém, estes sonhos correm risco de se tornarem pesadelos, pois seu pai, sua mãe, sua irmã e seu… gato (?) estão prestes a estudarem junto com ele.

altTitles.ja: ワンフォーオール

description.en:
"You wanna play rugby together?"

Arashi is a hot-blooded first year high school student enrolled on a rugby scholarship. Calling himself "the man who stirs up a storm", he unites a peculiar group of problem children, leading them towards the peak of high school rugby, Hanazono! A youth rugby club story told by the delinquent manga legend, Yanauchi Daiju!

“I wish to have you by my left shoulder, with a smile by my right– I wish to run freely in your eyes– I wish for one look to last a lifetime.”   
  
Jiang Cheng, an accomplished student, was "exiled" to the steel mill where his biological father worked. This strange, foreign environment, coupled with his rather vulgar biological father, caused Jiang Cheng to feel quite depressed… that is, until one day, he met Gu Fei, the "Delinquent of the Steel Mill", by chance. Thus begins the story of Jiang Cheng and Gu Fei, a story of salvation and hope…

(by Jupiter Scanlations)

Jake, a seemingly average office worker, unexpectedly finds himself thrust into a fantasy world teeming with dangers and opportunities. Rather than succumbing to fear, Jake thrives in this unfamiliar realm. As he navigates the expansive multiverse, his power grows and he transforms—evolving from a mundane office worker into a true apex hunter.

Set in the France 1835. The pretty Rose Dupre is bullied and called the witch's daughter. People say her mother is a witch who kills and eats humans. However, Marie and Peter don't believe all those rumors and decide to protect Rose… But what if the rumors are true?  
  
Note: The author has split the storyline into parts and seasons. Volume 1.1 for example means Part 1, Season 1.
description.id: Di kota Prancis yang dilanda ketakutan, Rose Dupre diintimidasi sebagai putri penyihir. Marie dan Pierre tidak percaya rumor seperti itu pada awalnya. Tetapi ketika gelombang kematian aneh menyapu, ketiga anak itu tidak lagi aman dari mata yang waspada. Bisakah Rose selamat dari kutukan sihir dan kecurigaan? Sebuah kisah gothic yang luas namun penuh warna dimulai.
description.zh:
在充满恐惧流言的法国小镇上，Rose Dupre作为女巫的女儿被欺凌。朋友玛丽和皮特起初并不相信这样的谣言。但是，当一波奇怪的死亡浪潮席卷而来时，三个孩子再也逃不过警惕的眼睛了。罗斯能从魔法和怀疑的诅咒中幸存下来吗?一个宏大而丰富多彩的哥特式故事开始了。

Source : Bato

description.en:
Unofficial Dragon Ball GT adaptation by the chinese “Xinjiang Youth Publishing House”.  
  
Age 789: Five years have passed since the 28th Tenkaichi Budokai, and all is peaceful around the world as Goku and Oob finish their training in Kami-sama’s palace. However, this peace soon ends as Pilaf makes a terrifying wish, transforming Goku into a child. The rush is on to retrieve all seven Ultimate Dragon Balls from around the Universe before the Earth and its inhabitants are destroyed…

altTitles.ja: ストラテジックラバーズ

description.en: Kouta, a high school boy whose father is the chairman of the Higashiyama Group, a large corporation involved in the development of railroads, department stores, and resort facilities, plays the leading role in a romantic survival game. As the son of his father's 23rd mistress, Kota doesn't really feel like the son of the chairman. Despite this, he's suddenly chosen as the next chairman of the Higashiyama Group and is assigned a girl to be his mistress.
description.es-la: Higashima Kouta, un chico inteligente en el ajedrez, cuya madre es la vigésimo tercera concubina de Higashima Keizou, un gran magnate. Al morir este, y no tener heredero varón, es elegido para tomar el control. Pero para eso, deberá elegir entre varias chicas y hacerla su amante. ¡Empieza el juego de supervivencia de seducción con estrategia!

altTitles.ja: イーヴォー

description.en:
Work, sleep, work, sleep... what a dull existence
Why even live?!
No hopes, no dreams
Everything’s predictable...
Suicide is salvation
But when you wake up in purgatory...
...and it's the same world you left?

One option left
Let's turn this fuckin' world upside down


The story of "Evol" begins in a village occupied by an armed group when a young girl, driven by despair, attempts suicide. She survives and wakes up, but when a man tries to drive her into a corner, a strange phenomenon occurs. The place changes, and something also happens to the boy who wakes up in the hospital after committing suicide.
description.es: Trabajar, dormir, trabajar, dormir... qué existencia más aburrida. ¡¿Para qué vivir?! Sin esperanzas, sin sueños. Todo es tan previsible... El suicidio es la única salvación. Pero cuando te despiertas en el infierno... ¿Y si resulta que es el mismo mundo que abandonaste? Solo queda una opción. Pongamos este maldito mundo patas arriba.

altTitles.ja: ロック

description.en:
We begin the story as Rock has left her husband, Astro, and their children and wants a divorce because Astro has cheated on Rock (again). As the five year old twins, Rockette and Astro Junior, find pictures of their parents when they were young, we flash back to the ever so popular romcom scenario of when Rock met Astro... except it's Kyoko Okazaki so it's messy, it's kooky, it's funny and it's all in a way that's unique to Kyoko Okazaki.
Between romantic comedy and hallucinated fairy tail, Kyoko Okazaki blows a wind of hysteria in the fashion world and its nights saturated with music and drugs.

altTitles.ja: 高飛車ドレイちゃん

description.en: At the market, a man stumbles upon a particularly arrogant slave...
description.pt-br: No mercado, um homem se depara com uma escrava particularmente arrogante...

altTitles.en: They Say I'm the Villainous Young Miss

altTitles.vi: Họ Đồn Tôi Là Đại Tiểu Thư Xấu Xa

description.en: I worked as a manhua artist, then died from pulling an all-nighter. I woke up as the villainess "Emi Morwen" from my webcomic! Emi was an alluring yet cruel character who departed from the story by ending her own life. However, I’m not the real Emi!
description.vi: 《Sau khi thức quá khuya, chạy deadline để rồi kết thúc sinh mệnh, tôi đã tái sinh thành nhân vật phản diện trong truyện tranh của mình》

altTitles.ja: ドラゴンボール角明

description.en: The story in Dragon Ball Kakumei picks up right after the Tournament of Power and deals with the consequences of Android 17 restoring the erased universes. In addition to the six universes destroyed by Zeno, the wish brought back Universe 19, which has warriors that are powerful enough to take down Zeno and the angels.
description.pt-br:
“Quando o desejo do Androide 17 no final do Torneio do Poder leva o mundo a uma Guerra Multiversal, aliados de todos os universos terão que se fortalecer para enfrentar divindades malignas e, desta vez, eles terão que defender todos sem Goku”.

Criado pelos franceses Darkows (roteiro), Reenko (roteiro) e Poissonlabo (desenhista), Dragon Ball Kakumei é um mangá não oficial que conta uma história alternativa se caso o desejo do Androide 17, ao fim do Torneio do Poder, restaurasse os 18 universos que existiam originalmente, levando a uma Guerra Multiversal entre grandes divindades, mas sem a presença de Son Goku.

Com uma arte atípica, em se tratando de um mangá feito por fãs (que geralmente costumam tentar emular os traços de Akira Toriyama), além de uma história com uma narrativa e proposta bem diferente da leveza e simplicidade da obra original, Dragon Ball Kakumei é, sem dúvidas, um dos mangás não oficiais de Dragon Ball mais famosos, ao lado de outros projetos de fãs como Dragon Ball AF e Dragon Ball Multiverse.

title.en: I refuse this kind of reliance

altTitles.ja: こんな憑依、お断りします

description.fr: Avez-vous déjà voyagé dans l'une des romans que vous avez lus ? Après être devenue un personnage de livre, notre héroïne, Diana, a immédiatement commencé à rêver d'une fin heureuse, à profiter de la vie dans un nouveau monde. Tomber amoureuse du personnage principal, l'épouser, vivre heureuse jusquà la fin des temps - une histoire typique de la renaissance d'une fille, n'est-ce pas ? Quelle ne fut pas la déception de Diana lorsqu'elle réalisa qu'elle n'était pas dans une histoire d'amour, mais dans une aventure fantastique avec des monstres et une fenêtre de caractérisation ! Voulant une lie luxueuse dans un nouveau monde, Diana refuse d'accepter sa nouvelle réalité !

title.en: She Who Doesn't Say Anything Good

altTitles.ja: ろくなことを言い出さない彼女

title.en: Golden Light Gratia, The Child Loved By God

altTitles.pt-br: Luz Dourada Gratia, a criança amada por Deus

altTitles.ko: 신의 사랑을 받는 아이, 황금빛 그라티아

description.en:
Gratia, a girl considered useless and despised by her family, has a revealing dream where a mysterious man predicts a great future for her. She soon discovers that she is the lost daughter of the influential Luciffero family. In a surprising event, after being attacked, a golden light erupts from Gratia, forcing everyone around her to close their eyes.

When the light dissipates, young Gratia disappears and in her place an adult version of herself appears, with distinct features of Luciffero. With an imposing stature and undeniable beauty, she comes across Nea, her mother, and realizes that the transformation expected for the future happened that day.

This was the moment when ten-year-old Gratia and twenty-year-old Gratia switched bodies for the first time.
description.pt-br:
Gratia, uma menina considerada inútil e desprezada pela família, tem um sonho revelador onde um homem misterioso prevê um grande futuro para ela. Ela logo descobre que é a filha perdida da influente família Luciffero. Num acontecimento surpreendente, após ser atacada, uma luz dourada irrompe de Gratia, obrigando todos ao seu redor a fecharem os olhos.

Quando a luz se dissipa, a jovem Gratia desaparece e em seu lugar aparece uma versão adulta dela mesma, com características distintas de Luciffero. De estatura imponente e beleza inegável, ela se depara com Nea, sua mãe, e percebe que a transformação esperada para o futuro aconteceu naquele dia.

Este foi o momento em que Gratia, de dez anos, e Gratia, de vinte, trocaram de corpo pela primeira vez.

altTitles.ja: 願いのアストロ

description.en:
The new series from Ken Wakui, the creator of Shinjuku Swan and Tokyo Revengers!

As the battle to decide the next leader of the Yotsurugi gang that runs Asakusa is heating up, a meteorite strike suddenly awakens superpowers in the people of Japan. How will Hibaru Yotsurugi, the son of the previous gang leader, come out of this?!
description.fr: Le nouveau manga de Ken Wakui, le créateur de Shinjuku Swan et Tokyo Revengers ! Alors que la bataille pour désigner le prochain chef du clan Yotsurugi qui dirige Asakusa s'intensifie, la chute d'une météorite réveille soudainement des super-pouvoirs chez les Japonais. Comment Hibaru Yotsurugi, le fils du précédent boss du clan va-t-il s'en sortir ?

title.en: Becoming a Wicked Witch With a Paladin’s First Night

altTitles.es: La villana se robó la virginidad del caballero santo

altTitles.ja: 聖騎士の初夜を奪った悪女

description.en:
I was hit by a truck and transported to the world of a novel I had read. Unfortunately, I was possessed by Elenia Alfin, the evil woman from the novel, and the story begins with me sleeping in the same bed as the most loyal holy knight, Sir Rolento, if you know what I mean…

I remembered from the novel, “If a holy knight has a relationship with a woman, he is stripped of his status as a holy knight,” so I decided to try to avoid it and pretend that nothing had happened between the two of us.

Then, Rolento said something shocking: “Please, take responsibility for stealing my virginity.

altTitles.ja: キン肉マン

description.en:
Kinnikuman (Muscleman), a weak and clumsy super hero, constantly getting into wacky situations. As the series progressed, the story began changing from comedy to action as Kinnikuman battles stronger and stronger foes in the wrestling ring. The series continually introduced new Super Human characters, known as Chojin, who would challenge Kinnikuman and his friends for various purposes.  
    
---
- **The original run was from 1979-1986 and ended with Vol. 36. The series directly continued in 2011 with Vol. 38.**
- **The 2011 Chapters resets the Count to 1 during it set of volumes (Beyond Vol 36)**

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen in 1985**
description.pt-br:
Kinnikuman (Homem Músculo), um super-herói fraco e desajeitado, constantemente entrando em situações malucas. À medida que a série avançava, a história começou a mudar de comédia para ação, enquanto Kinnikuman lutava contra inimigos cada vez mais fortes no ringue de luta livre. A série continuamente introduziu novos personagens Super Humanos, conhecidos como Chojin, que desafiariam Kinnikuman e seus amigos para vários propósitos. 

A serialização original foi de 1979-1986 e terminou com o Vol. 36. A série continuou diretamente em 2010. 

Ganhou o Shogakukan Manga Awards por melhor Shounen em 1985.

description.en: Gags of a Catholic Convent on a Fantasy World.
description.pt-br: Tirinhas sobre um Convento Católico num mundo de fantasia.

altTitles.ja: 原神 コミックアンソロジー

altTitles.en: Genshin Impact Comic Anthology (DNA Media Comics)

description.en:
A comic anthology based off of the video game Genshin Impact.

___

Cover Illustration: Arutera (あるてら)
1. Hakua to Gaitou (白亜と外套) [Azuma Kouji]
2. Hu Tao wa Nana ni Sukaretai! (胡桃〈フータオ〉は七七に好かれたい!) [Manarou (まなろう)]
3. Boss wa Itsudatte Shimensoka (BOSSはいつだって四面楚歌) [Kyo zip]
4. Oryouri Daisakusen! (お料理大作戦!) [Sofura (そふら)]
5. Fire Friends! (ファイア・フレンズ!) [Takahara Yu (高原由)]
6. Kuugei Sanpo (空鯨散歩) [Winuwi (ゐぬゐ)]
7. Toaru Koujo no Onayami Soudan (とある皇女のお悩み相談) [Amamiya Yuki (雨宮結生)]
8. Toaru Hi no Ketsumatsu (とある日の結末) [Aku (あく)]
9. Sono Kamen no Shita ni Aru Mono (その仮面の下に在るもの) [Gyouza Nuko (餃子ぬこ)]
10. Tabibito to Issho ga Iin da zo! (旅人と一緒がいいんだぞ!) [Coyucomu (コユコム)]
11. Ganyu no Oshigoto (甘雨〈カンウ〉のお仕事) [Hattori Masaki]
12. Otabe Kudasai! (お食べくだ菜!) [Kurono Yuu]
description.es-la: Un Comic antológico basado en el video juego Genshin Impact.

altTitles.ja: オオカミくんは好きが隠せない

altTitles.en: The Wolf can't Hide His Affection

description.en:
This is a world where humans and beast people coexist. The helpful leopard, Tomoru, and the wolf, Hibiki, who goes at his own pace, are childhood friends who live together. One day, Tomoru is told by Hibiki that he likes him, and their relationship changes!!! Tomorou, who realizes he thinks of Hibiki as more than family, accepts his confession, and the two of them start dating.
However, Hibiki changes into his beast form whenever he gets excited. How will he skillfully make out now they're lovers...?!

altTitles.ja: 今日もハジメ先輩が好きすぎる

description.en: Kokomi enters into a new school but ends up tearing her clothes. The kind and popular Hajime lends her some clothes and she falls in love with him at first sight, after not being able to speak to him for a long time, she discovers a terrible truth about him but is undeterred into trying to win his heart.

altTitles.ja: 魔法少女にあこがれて

description.en:
Hiiragi Utena, a girl who loves Magical Girls, lives her ordinary everyday life wishing to be like them. One day a curious character appears in front of her and offers her the power to make her wishes come true, but…  
Magical Girls vs. The Forces of Evil, the fierce battle begins!  

---
**Links:**

- [Alternative Official Release by Coolmic](https://coolmic.me/titles/1110)
description.fr:
**Je fais des choses tellement horribles à mes Magical Girls préférées !**

Moi, c’est Utena Hiiragi, et comme toutes les filles de mon âge, j’adore les magical girls !
Un jour, une étrange créature aux allures de mascotte m’a lancé un sort, et je suis devenue capable de me transformer, moi aussi !
Je vais pouvoir me battre aux côtés de mes héroïnes préférées !
Enfin, c’est ce que je croyais…

C’est quoi, cette tenue scandaleuse ?
Et comment ça, je suis au service du Mal ?!

Mais qu’est-ce que c’est que cette histoire ?!

**La comédie BDSM dans laquelle s’affrontent des Magical Girls !!**

**Avec ses personnages tous plus fous les uns que les autres, Looking Up to Magical Girls balaye les genres et nous place du côté du mal ! Akihiro Ononaka déploie tout l’arsenal BDSM à sa disposition pour nous proposer un concentré d’humour légèrement sexy et complètement déjanté !**

---
**Links:**
- [Official French](https://www.amazon.fr/Looking-up-Magical-Girls-1/dp/2382750731/)
description.uk: Хііраґі Утена завжди захоплювалася чарівними дівчатами і мріяла перетворитися на круту героїню, яка бореться зі злом. Тож, коли одного вечора до неї підходить талісман, яка стверджує, що в ній дрімає магічна сила, вона тремтить від хвилювання. Але її барвиста мрія швидко розбивається об іронічний поворот подій, коли вона перетворюється на лиходійку!
description.es-la:
Hiiragi Utena, una chica que ama a las Chicas Mágicas, vive su vida cotidiana y desea ser como ellas.
Un día aparece un personaje curioso frente a ella y le ofrece el poder de hacer realidad sus deseos, pero...
Magical Girls vs. The Forces of Evil, ¡comienza la feroz batalla!
description.pt-br: Hiiragi Utena é uma garota apaixonada por Mahou Shoujo que sonhava em se tornar uma delas e poder lutar ao lado de sua heroína favorita. Certo dia, um mascote inesperadamente apareceu ao seu lado e lançou uma feitiço em Hiiragi, oferecendo a ela a oportunidade de estar de frente para sua ídolo. Entretanto, diferente do que ela esperava, a transformação a fez virar uma vilã ao invés de uma mahou shoujo. Para piorar, a mudança faz com que ela deixe de ser uma tímida garota e passe a ser uma dominatrix sádica. Agora Hiiragi precisará lidar com sua nova “profissão”, ao mesmo tempo que tenta aproveitar os momentos ao lado de sua heroína, por mais que seja para tentar torturá-la.

title.en: Sousou no Frieren - Gaku Paro na Shutaferu (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: 葬送のフリーレン - 学パロなシュタフェル

altTitles.en: Frieren at the Funeral - Stark X Fern: School AU
Frieren: Beyond Journey’s End - Stark X Fern: School AU

altTitles.uk: Фрірен: подорож після кінця. Старк x Ферн: Шкільний Всесвіт

description.en:
**Notes:**
- The author skipped chapter 2.

title.ja: Class Saiyasune de Urareta Ore wa, Jitsu wa Saikyou Parameter

altTitles.en: I Was Sold at the Lowest Price in My Class, However, My Personal Parameter Is the Most Powerful

altTitles.ja: クラス最安値で売られた俺は、実は最強パラメーター

altTitles.id: Aku Dijual dengan Harga Terendah di kelasku, namun Parameter Pribadiku adalah yang Paling Kuat

altTitles.zh-hk: 以全班最低價格賣出的我，實際上是最強

description.en:
Yuta, a boy who was sent to another world with his classmates. A world that has been summoning earthlings, who tend to have high inherent power, to operate humanoid machines called "magic-machines" using the special power "Ludia" contained within humans.

However, Yuta’s Ludia value has an abysmally low reading of "2". Although his peers are auctioned off at a high price, Yuta is sold at the "lowest price" and turned into a slave.  However, will an encounter with the white, magic-machine, Arleo, change his fate?

A journey from being an unwanted slave to becoming the strongest hero who shakes the world! The new world Mecha Battle Entertainment has begun
description.id:
Yuta, seorang anak laki-laki yang dikirim ke dunia lain bersama teman-teman sekelasnya.

Ini memanggil dan menggunakan penduduk bumi yang cenderung memiliki nilai tinggi di dunia yang berbeda di mana mesin humanoid yang disebut "mesin sihir" dioperasikan dengan kekuatan khusus "Ludia" yang terdapat pada manusia. 

Nilai Ludia Yuta hanya "2" sementara banyak teman yang membeli dengan harga tinggi. Yuta dibeli dengan "harga terendah" dan diubah menjadi budak, tetapi pertemuan dengan mesin sihir putih "Arleo" membangunkannya menjadi pria yang kuat--!?

Dari budak dengan harga terendah di kelasnya, dunia baru Mecha Battle Entertainment telah mulai menjadi pahlawan terkuat yang mengguncang dunia!
description.es-la: Durante el viaje escolar, el autobús de la clase 3 de segundo año con 32 personas fue convocado a otro mundo... íbamos a ser vendidos para convertirnos en pilotos de robots como armas mágicas, pero parece que los valores de los precios de venta son decididos por algún tipo de parámetro desconocido llamado Ludia .Mientras algunos compañeros obtuvieron precios altos con parámetros de 10,000 o 20,000, mis parámetros eran en realidad 2... realmente increíble, pero en realidad el valor de mi parámetro hizo que la aguja de la maquina de medición realizara una vuelta completa, pero nadie lo notó... aunque tenia los parámetros más fuertes... nadie me compro y, de hecho, me cambiaron como esclavo por dos frutas

title.ja: A Banished Sage’s Progress to Discovering the World: The Story of What Happened When I Freed Myself from My Childhood Friend

altTitles.ja: 追放の賢者、世界を知る ～幼馴染勇者の圧力から逃げて自由になった俺～

altTitles.en: A Banished Sage Experiencing the World ~ I Escaped from the Pressure of My Childhood Friend Who Is a Hero and Became Free~
A Banished Sage's Progress to Discovering the World: The Story of What Happened When I Freed Myself from My Childhood Friend

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsuihou no Kenja, Sekai wo Shiru ~Osanajimi Yuusha no Atsuryoku kara Nigete Jiyuu ni Natta Ore~

description.en: The wizard Haru spent his days being abused by the hero, his childhood friend Leticia, when one day while being scolded he thought to himself, "This is no good". And thus began Haru's adventure to regain his true self! The curtain unveils on an other world "redo" fantasy life!

altTitles.ja: サテライト・コインランドリー

description.en: This work depicts the slightly mysterious daily life that happens in a laundromat in a corner of the universe. On this planet blessed with water, today creatures visit again to wash various items. (MTLd?)

altTitles.ja: リオンクール戦記

description.en:
Tadashi Tanaka is a typical office worker whose life comes to an abrupt end at the age of 41 due to cancer. But instead of going to heaven, he finds himself in a world resembling medieval Europe. Much like the Middle Ages, there are no modern conveniences, people eat with their hands, and pigs roam free in the streets. Worst of all, wars between nations are an everyday occurrence. Now, Tadashi Tanaka must live his second life as Varian de Lioncourt. 

Can an ordinary office worker survive in this cruel world? Varian’s rise to power begins here!

---

**Links:**  
- [Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n4662ec/) (Japanese)

title.en: Saikyou ni Uzai Kanojo no, Asu kara Tsukaeru Mount Lesson

altTitles.ja: 最強にウザい彼女の、明日から使えるマウント教室

altTitles.en: The Most Annoying Girlfriend's Mount Class, Available Tomorrow
How to Handle Your Super Annoying Girlfriend: A Practical Guide

description.en:
Mount! is the ultimate ranking method that has been passed down since ancient times.
At Saginomiya Academy, a private school for children of the upper class, there is an absolute rule: It is to take mount and win! 

Rei Satou, who is the very definition of average, is destined to be in the lowest class. Where he will spend three years being bullied by the rich. At this point, the only way to survive is to rise to the S class.  But before his shocked eyes, a beautiful stranger suddenly appears. Tsukinami Senri kisses him out of the blue and says, 

"Let's be lovers and take the happiness mount!" "How come?!"

Team up with the most annoying girlfriend and aim for the top of the school!
description.ja:
笑える頭脳バトル爆誕！！！！！
「マウンティング！」それは、古代より伝わる最強の格付け方法である。
上流階級の子息が集まる私立鷺ノ宮学園には、絶対のルールが存在する。
それは、マウントを取って勝ち上がること！　ザ・一般人の佐藤零は、このままでは最下位クラス確定。お金持ちに虐げられる３年間を送ることに。生き残るにはSクラスに上がるしかない。
愕然とする彼の前に、突然現れた見知らぬ美少女。月並千里は、いきなりキスして言う。
「幸せマウントを取るため、私と恋人になって！」「なんで!?」
最強にウザい彼女と手を組んで、学園の頂点を目指せ！　
小学館ライトノベル大賞・優秀賞受賞作。ドタバタ展開てんこ盛り、新時代エンタメをとくと見よ！

altTitles.ja: 帝乃三姉妹は案外、チョロい。

altTitles.zh-hk: 帝乃三姊妹意外的好對付。

altTitles.en: The Mikadono Sisters Are Surprisingly Easy to Deal With.

altTitles.zh: 帝乃三姐妹原来很好搞定

altTitles.id: Kakak beradik Mikadono ternyata sangat mudah ditangani.

description.en: Though Ayase Yuu is the son of a renowned and talented actress, he is below average in anything he does. He is entrusted to live under the care of his mother's friend, and later discovers that he will also be rooming with the three sisters from his school who possess both beauty and talent. Though Yuu thought that an understanding would be impossible to reach between an ordinary person and those blessed with talent, the three sisters are surprisingly...?!
description.id: Meskipun Ayase Yuu adalah putra seorang aktris terkenal dan berbakat, dia berada di bawah rata-rata dalam segala hal yang dia lakukan. Dia dipercaya untuk hidup di bawah asuhan teman ibunya, dan kemudian mengetahui bahwa dia juga akan sekamar dengan tiga saudara perempuan dari sekolahnya yang memiliki kecantikan dan bakat. Meskipun Yuu berpikir bahwa pemahaman tidak mungkin dicapai antara orang biasa dan mereka yang diberkati dengan bakat, ketiga saudara perempuan itu secara mengejutkan...?!
description.ja:
孤高の天才三姉妹と同居することになったちょっとポンコツめな高校生・優。平凡以下な彼が三姉妹に振り回されると思いきや…この三姉妹、案外、チョロい――？

優との生活で変わっていく三姉妹の心模様。才色兼備の三姉妹が動揺、狼狽、そしてときめく…

altTitles.ja: 合鍵くんと幸せごはん

description.en: Nagisa, an office worker, ends up (almost) living together with Hiro, a long-distance driver. Food tastes even better than usual with “Aikagi-kun” and his big appetite. The casual time they spend together begins to color their days… A heartwarming story about a nearly thirty office worker and a younger man (almost) living together!
description.pt-br: Nagisa, uma funcionária de escritório, acaba (quase) morando junto com Hiro, um motorista de longa distância.  A comida tem um sabor ainda melhor do que o habitual com “Aikagi-kun” e seu grande apetite.  O tempo casual que passam juntos começa a colorir seus dias... Uma história comovente sobre um funcionário de escritório de quase trinta anos e um homem mais jovem (quase) vivendo juntos!

title.en: Gal no Haigo ni Rei ga Iru

altTitles.en: There's a Ghost Behind the Gyaru

altTitles.ja: ギャルの背後に霊がいる

altTitles.en: The ghost is behind the gal

description.en: A girl notices something lurking behind her friend.

title.en: Sometimes Even Reality Is a Lie!

altTitles.ja: 現実(リアル)もたまには嘘をつく
現実もたまには嘘をつく
ゲーム好きの友達と色々する話

altTitles.ja-ro: Real mo Tama ni wa Uso wo Tsuku
Gemuzuki no Tomodachi to Iroiro suru Hanashi

altTitles.en: Hanging Out with a Gamer Girl

altTitles.uk: Іноді навіть реальність може бути оманливою

altTitles.hi: कभी कभी सच भी झूठ होता है!

altTitles.zh: 和喜欢游戏的朋友各种轶事

altTitles.zh-hk: 和喜歡游戲的朋友各種軼事

altTitles.vi: Đi chơi cùng nữ game thủ
Hẹn hò cùng nữ game thủ

description.en: Kaoru Terasaki is a gamer who’s into MMORPGs, and he’s finally meeting up with someone he’s been friends with in-game for a long while—this time, offline and in person. He’s worried that his friend will be disappointed to see Kaoru is a guy, unlike his female character in the game. But he’s the one who’s in for a surprise when, instead of another guy, his friend turns out to be a cute girl, Nanami Osaka. On top of that, Nanami told her parents that she would be bringing a friend over—a female friend. Even worse, Nanami’s dad is the super overprotective type who won’t allow any guys near his daughter. There’s only one solution to this dilemma: Kaoru has to cross-dress as a girl! Will Kaoru’s efforts pay off in the end?! Will Kaoru and Nanami remain just friends, or will their time together IRL change everything? Follow their romantic-comedy adventures to find out!
description.fr: Terazaki Kaoru est sur le point de rencontrer son ami en ligne, Nanami. Mais Nanami ne sait pas que Terazaki est en réalité un homme dans la vie réelle! Il sera certainement déçu et dégouté. Mais Terazaki va lui avoir aussi une surprise…
description.id:
Terazaki Kaoru akan bertemu dengan salah satu teman dari Game Online yang dia mainkan bernama Nanami. Namun, Nanami hanya tahu kalau Kaoru di dalam Game adalah karakter perempuan imut yang bernama Kaori, tapi dia tidak tahu kalau Kaoru di dunia nyata sebenarnya adalah seorang laki-laki.

Saat bertemu dengannya nanti, Nanami pasti akan kecewa dan merasa sedikit aneh, namun… Ketika bertemu, Kaoru pun sontak ikut terkejut. Karena Nanami ternyata…
description.it: Terazaki Kaoru sta per incontrare il suo amico di internet, Nanami. Ma Nanami non sa che Terazaki è un ragazzo nella realta! Con questo Nanami Potrebbe rimanerci delusa o forse trovarlo strano (considerando che l' avatar di Kaoru è femminile), ma ciò che il ragazzo non sa, è che riceverà una sorpresa a sua volta…
description.ja:
友達以上、恋人未満のふたりが繰り広げるハイテンションラブコメディ!

ゲーム好きな男の子、薫はネットゲームで知り合った男性と駅で待ち合わせ。女性キャラを使っていたせいで女の子だと勘違いされていることを心配する薫だが、待ち合わせ場所にやってきたのはかわいい女の子で……?
description.pt: Terazaki Kaoru está prestes a encontrar seu amigo de internet, Nanami. Mas Nanami não sabe que ele é um cara na vida real! ele pode se decepcionar ou ao menos achar estranho (considerando que seu avatar é feminino), mas Terazaki está prestes a ter uma surpresa…
description.ru:
Заядлый геймер Каору Тэрадзаки собирается встретиться с подругой Нанами, с которой познакомился в онлайн-игре. До этого они не виделись в реальной жизни, так что Нанами не знает, что, хотя в игре Тэрадзаки использовал женского персонажа, в реальной жизни он — парень. Каору убеждён, что Нанами наверняка будет разочарована этим фактом, но его ждёт сюрприз...

(Source: [shikimori](https://shikimori.one/mangas/124209-real-mo-tama-ni-wa-uso-wo-tsuku))
description.uk: Каору Теразакі — геймер, котрий захоплюється MMORPG, там він знайшов друга, з котрим товаришував протягом досить тривалого проміжку часу. І ось настав час зустрітися з ним особисто – поза межами онлайн. Та все не так просто, як здавалося на перший погляд, так як Каору грав під дівочим аватаром, його товариш вважає, що той – дівчина. Каору знаходиться у тривожному передчутті, що як його друг буде розчарований? Ба більше, на нього також чекав сюрприз – замість іншого хлопця, його другом виявляється симпатична дівчина – Нанамі Осака. До того ж, Нанамі заздалегідь попередила батьків, що приведе з собою друга – подругу. Ситуація ускладняється тим, що у Нанамі занадто турботливий тато, котрий віддубасить кожного хлопця, котрий посміє наблизитися до його доньки. Ця дилема має лише одне рішення: Каору треба переодягтися в дівчину! Чи окупляться зрештою зусилля Каору?! Чи залишаться Каору та Нанамі просто друзями, чи час, який вони провели у реальному житті разом, все змінить? Слідкуйте за їхніми романтичними пригодами, щоб дізнатися!
description.pt-br: Terazaki Kaoru está prestes a encontrar seu amigo de internet, Nanami. Mas Nanami não sabe que ele é um cara na vida real! ele pode se decepcionar ou ao menos achar estranho (considerando que seu avatar é feminino), mas Terazaki está prestes a ter uma surpresa…

altTitles.ja: 終末のワルキューレ 総天然色

description.fr: Shuumatsu No Valkyrie (Valkyrie Apocalypse) arrive maintenant dans le monde du webtoon, dans un nouveau format reprenant l'histoire, mais avec plusieurs nouveautés ! L'histoire commence lorsque les dieux se réunissent en congrès pour décider de laisser l'humanité vivre ou mourir, et décident de détruire l'humanité. Mais une Valkyrie solitaire suggère de laisser les dieux et l'humanité se battre une dernière fois, comme dernier espoir de survie de l'humanité. 13 dieux affronteront 13 champions humains dans des combats en tête-à-tête pour décider si l'humanité vit ou meurt.
description.pt-br:
Agora Shuumatsu No Valkyrie (Record of Ragnarok) chega ao mundo dos Webtoon, num novo formato recontando a história, mas com várias novidades!

A história começa quando os deuses convocam uma convenção para decidir se deixam a humanidade viver ou morrer, e decidem destruir a humanidade. Mas uma Valquíria solitária apresenta a sugestão de deixar os deuses e a humanidade travarem uma última batalha, como última esperança para a sobrevivência contínua da humanidade. 13 deuses lutarão contra 13 campeões humanos em batalhas um contra um para decidir se a humanidade vive ou morre.

altTitles.ja: ハダカメラ

description.en:
Because he did not pass his college entrance exam, Kagami Kyosuke cannot stay close to Kojo Hikari, the love of his life. So instead he gets a part-time job near her university and buys an old camera since Hikari is passionate for photography. But as it turns out, that camera also has a secret which will get him involved in all sorts of "exciting" and "awkward" situations especially with Botan Oshikiri, his senpai and co-worker. How will Kyosuke's life play out now?  


---
description.id: Karena dia tidak lulus ujian masuk perguruan tinggi, Kagami Kyosuke tidak bisa tinggal dekat dengan Kojo Hikari, cinta dalam hidupnya. Jadi alih-alih dia mendapatkan pekerjaan paruh waktu di dekat universitasnya dan membeli kamera tua karena Hikari sangat menyukai fotografi. Namun ternyata, kamera itu juga memiliki rahasia yang akan membuatnya terlibat dalam segala macam situasi "menarik" dan "canggung" terutama dengan Botan Oshikiri, senpai dan rekan kerjanya. Bagaimana kehidupan Kyosuke mulai dari sekarang?
description.ru:
Провалившись на вступительных экзаменах в университет, Кагами Кёскэ также потерял возможность сблизиться со своей школьной любовью — Кодзё Хикари. Надеясь сохранить с ней связь, он не только устраивается работать в кафе рядом с её кампусом, но и покупает подержанный полароид, чтобы найти общую тему для разговоров с увлекающейся искусством фотографии Хикари. Однако Кагами не знал, что он приобрел очень необычный фотоаппарат…  


---

altTitles.ja: まゆりさんのいる銭湯

description.en: 300 years ago, Martial God Hyun-oh Kim defeated Barche, the boss of the tower of destruction, and prevented the end of the world. Kim Hyun-oh, should have died suffering the same fate as the tower of destruction. However, after 300 years, he is reborn as the 17-year-old Kim Joo-hyuk. In the midst, he finds out that the “Constellations”, that were created during his absence, are his disciples from 300 years ago and sets on a journey to find them.

altTitles.ja: ウルフちゃんは澄ましたい

altTitles.id: Gadis Serigala Mencoba Untuk Berpura pura Tidak Peduli

altTitles.en: Wolf-chan Is Trying to Feign Indifference

description.en:
The cool, lone-wolf girl and her precious, unrequited crush!

(Source: Ganma!, translated)
description.ja: ウルフカットで一匹狼なクール系女子の尊い片想い！
description.pt-br: A loba solitária fria, e seu precioso amor não correspondido!

title.en: Medaka Kuroiwa is Impervious to My Charms

altTitles.ja-ro: Kuroiwa Medaka ni Watashi no Kawaii ga Tsuujinai

altTitles.en: My Charms Are Wasted on Medaka Kuroiwa

altTitles.ja: 黒岩メダカに私の可愛いが通じない

altTitles.ru: Куроива Мэдака не понимает моей привлекательности

altTitles.es-la: Mis encantos no funcionan con Kuroiwa Medaka

altTitles.zh: 我的可爱对黑岩目高不管用

description.en:
Kuroiwa Medaka was born in a temple and is currently a monk in training. Because of his temple's rules, he can't interact with girls - and what's more, he doesn't even know how to regularly socialize with them. Mona, the "queen bee" of the school, however insistently tries to make him fall in love with her, but he always ignores her in order to maintain the rules of his temple.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10032/episode/312982) (U.S. Only)
description.fr:
Tu ne le sais pas encore, mais tu m’adores !

Mona plaît à tout le monde, c’est comme ça. Son sourire, son allure, sa personnalité… Tout chez elle attire les gens. Dans son lycée, elle fait tourner toutes les têtes. Sauf celle d’un garçon… Medaka. Fraîchement admis dans son école, celui-ci a complètement chamboulé la vie de cette fille à qui nul ni personne n’est censé résister. C’est bien simple : Medaka refuse de la regarder ou se renfrogne à la moindre de ses tentatives de rapprochement. Devant cette insulte à son charme ravageur, Mona décide de tout mettre en œuvre pour le séduire, quitte à se mettre dans des situations où elle-même ne saura plus quoi ressentir ! La tombeuse VS l’insensible : qui craquera en premier ? 

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Pika**
description.ja:
オチないアイツに、最強モテ女が大奮闘！「アイツのことなんて、ぜんっぜん好きじゃないないのに！！」

容姿端麗！ スタイル抜群！ 川井モナは、息をするようにモテる女!!　しかし、そんな彼女に見向きもしない転校生・黒岩メダカの登場で、モナの学校生活は一変する！　「今までずっと、チヤホヤされて生きてきたのに!!」あの手この手でメダカをオトそうと大奮闘！　時にはちょっぴりカゲキなことも!?　
モテ女子×禁欲男子のラブコメディ、大勃発――!!
description.ru: Куроива Мэдака родился в храме и в настоящее время является монахом, проходящим обучение. Из-за правил своего храма он не может общаться с девушками и более того, он даже не знает, как с ними общаться. Мона, "королева пчёл" школы, однако настойчиво пытается заставить его влюбиться в неё, но он всегда игнорирует её, чтобы сохранить правила своего храма.
description.es-la:
La mujer más popular del mundo lucha contra un tipo que no le gusta. ¡Ni siquiera me gusta en absoluto!

¡Buena apariencia! Estilo excepcional! ¡Kawai Mona es una mujer impresionante! Sin embargo, con la aparición de un estudiante transferido, Kuroiwa Medaka, que ni siquiera la mira, ¡la vida escolar de Mona cambiará por completo! "  Ella se ha pasado toda su vida siendo consentida y ha hecho todo lo posible por ganarse a Medaka que aveces pueder un poco radical.

¡La comedia romantica de una chica popular y un chico abstinente está a punto de estallar!
description.pt-br: Kuroiwa nasceu em um templo e atualmente é um monge em treinamento. Por causa das regras do seu templo, ele não pode interagir com garotas - e mais, nem mesmo sabe como fazer isso. Mona, a "abelha rainha" da escola, insistentemente tenta fazê-lo se apaixonar por ela, mas ele sempre a ignora a fim de se manter íntegro quanto as regras do seu templo.
